name: Hurdles Race Summer Games 2016
description:
Jump your way to success in the ultimate challenging sport, the 110 metre hurdle sprin! Run fast and overcome all hurdles in your way to become the world champion and take the gold! Compete against teams from all corners of the world to win your medal and stand on the podium.

Tap fast to run and jump over hurdles. You'll have to be quick and time your jumps, or you will stumble and your championship dream will be over!

- Run and jump in the 110m hurdles event!
- Take part in the Summer Games!
- Race against multiple world teams!
- Lots of tracks in the hurdles championship!
